scripts.new: pnpm cleanup && pnpm i && rimraf dist && rimraf ./build && swc src --out-dir dist
scripts.iNew: pnpm cleanup && rimraf prisma/migrations && rimraf prisma/down.sql && prisma migrate diff --from-schema-datamodel prisma/schema.prisma --to-schema-datasource prisma/schema.prisma --script > prisma/down.sql && prisma migrate dev --name start && rimraf ./build && swc src --out-dir dist --ignore 'src/tests/**'
scripts.prisma:up: rimraf prisma/migrations && rimraf prisma/down.sql && pnpm Prisma:Create:Drop && prisma migrate dev --name start
scripts.prisma:update: pnpm prisma:down && rimraf prisma/migrations && rimraf prisma/down.sql && prisma migrate reset -f && pnpm Prisma:Create:Drop && prisma migrate dev --name start
scripts.prisma:updateDev: pnpm prisma:down && rimraf prisma/migrations && rimraf prisma/down.sql && prisma migrate reset -f && pnpm Prisma:Create:Drop && prisma migrate dev --name start && pnpm exec cross-env NODE_ENV="development" db-migrate db:drop table_test -e development && pnpm exec db-migrate db:create table_test -e development && cross-env NODE_ENV=test ts-node --esm testDbUp.ts
scripts.Prisma:Create:Drop: prisma migrate diff --from-schema-datamodel prisma/schema.prisma --to-schema-datasource prisma/schema.prisma --script > prisma/down.sql
scripts.reset:db: pnpm exec cross-env NODE_ENV="test" db-migrate db:drop table_dev -e test && pnpm exec db-migrate db:create table_dev -e test && cross-env NODE_ENV=development ts-node testDbUp.ts
